languages.text: "Предохранительная система, оберегающая зал, управляется с машинного алтаря, который необходимо вывести из строя. Если все эти манипуляции будут совершены, я могу гарантировать, что ни один нечестивец не переживет гнева Омниссии, который изольется сюда".

"The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the Omnissiah's wrath that will be unleashed upon this place."
languages.original_text: "Предохранительная система, оберегающая зал, управляется с машинного алтаря, который необходимо вывести из строя. Если все эти манипуляции будут совершены, я могу гарантировать, что ни один нечестивец не переживет гнева Омниссии, который изольется сюда".

traits.locale_text: "The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the wrath of the Omnissiah that will be unleashed upon this place."

"The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the wrath of the Omnissiah that will be unleashed upon this place."

"The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the Omnissiah's wrath that will be unleashed upon this place."

"The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the Omnissiah's wrath that will be unleashed upon this place."

languages.text: "Das Sicherheitssystem, welches die Halle beschützt, wird vom Maschinenaltar aus kontrolliert. Er muss deaktiviert werden. Wenn all diese Operationen ausgeführt werden, kann ich garantieren, dass kein einziger Blasphemist den Zorn des Omnissiah überleben wird, der auf diesen Ort herabregnen wird."
languages.original_text: "The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the Omnissiah's wrath that will be unleashed upon this place."

traits.locale_text: "Das Sicherheitssystem, welches die Halle beschützt, wird vom Maschinenaltar aus kontrolliert. Er muss deaktiviert werden. Wenn all diese Operationen ausgeführt werden, kann ich garantieren, dass kein einziger Blasphemist den Zorn des Omnissiah überleben wird, der auf diesen Ort herabregnen wird."

languages.text: « Le système de sécurité protégeant la salle est contrôlé depuis l'autel-machine... Il faut le désactiver. Si nous y parvenons, je peux vous garantir qu'aucun de ces blasphémateurs ne survivra à la colère de l'Omnimessie que nous déchaînerons ici. »
languages.original_text: "The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the Omnissiah's wrath that will be unleashed upon this place."

traits.locale_text: « Le système de sécurité protégeant la salle est contrôlé depuis l'autel-machine... Il faut le désactiver. Si nous y parvenons, je peux vous garantir qu'aucun de ces blasphémateurs ne survivra à la colère de l'Omnimessie que nous déchaînerons ici. »

languages.text: “负责保护大厅的安全系统由机械祭坛控制，我们必须将它关闭。如果计划顺利实施的话，我可以保证，在欧姆尼塞亚的怒火之下，没有任何亵渎者能活下来。”
languages.original_text: "The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the Omnissiah's wrath that will be unleashed upon this place."

traits.locale_text: “负责保护大厅的安全系统由机械祭坛控制，我们必须将它关闭。如果计划顺利实施的话，我可以保证，在欧姆尼塞亚的怒火之下，没有任何亵渎者能活下来。”

languages.text: 「ホールを守る安全システムは機械祭壇で制御されており、これを無効にしなければなりません。この操作を実行できれば、必ずや、この場に解き放たれる万機神の怒りを生き延びられる冒涜者はひとりもいないだろう」
languages.original_text: "The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the Omnissiah's wrath that will be unleashed upon this place."

traits.locale_text: 「ホールを守る安全システムは機械祭壇で制御されていて、これを無効にしなければならない。この操作を実行できれば、必ずや、この場に解き放たれる万機神の怒りを生き延びられる冒涜者はひとりもいないだろう」

languages.text: «El sistema de seguridad que protege la sala se controla desde el altar máquina, que debe desactivarse. Si se realizan todas estas operaciones, puedo garantizar que ni un solo blasfemo sobrevivirá a la ira del Omnissiah que se desatará sobre este lugar».
languages.original_text: "The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the Omnissiah's wrath that will be unleashed upon this place."

traits.locale_text: «El sistema de seguridad que protege la sala se controla desde el altar máquina, que debe desactivarse. Si se realizan todas estas operaciones, puedo garantizar que ni un solo blasfemo sobrevivirá a la ira del Omnissiah que se desatará sobre este lugar».

languages.text: "Salonu koruyan güvenlik sistemi, makine sunağından kontrol ediliyor. Onu devre dışı bırakmalıyız. Bunu yaparsak tek bir günahkârın bile Hermesih'in bu salona kusacağı gazabından sağ çıkamayacağını garanti ederim."
languages.original_text: "The safety system protecting the hall is controlled from the machine altar, which must be disabled. If all these operations are performed, I can guarantee that not a single blasphemer will survive the Omnissiah's wrath that will be unleashed upon this place."

traits.locale_text: "Salonu koruyan güvenlik sistemi, makine sunağından kontrol ediliyor. Onu devre dışı bırakmalıyız. Bunu yaparsak tek bir günahkârın bile Hermesih'in tüm öfkesini kusacağı bu salondan sağ çıkamayacağını garanti ederim."
